channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Temp lights, 5th November
item.description:
Temporary lights ? No one working ? Traffic stacked Up ? Completely pointless ?.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerb Stone, 5th November
item.description:
Kerb stone displaced and sticking out on to highway at junction of Cheltenham Road East and Heathdean Road ,Churchdown ? Urgent repair needed .????..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 5th November
item.description:
